abstract: A public radio host who was linked this week to antiwar and anti-corporate-greed protests in Washington has been fired by one of her radio producers.
snippet: A public radio host who was linked this week to antiwar and anti-corporate-greed protests in Washington has been fired by one of her radio producers.
lead_paragraph: A public radio host who was linked this week to antiwar and anti-corporate-greed protests in Washington, D.C., has been fired by one radio producer that employs her, but supported by another.

headline.main: Public Radio Host Linked to Protest is Dismissed
